prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Archival transfer from the Office of Student Housing, 1984 January 4.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a dormitory register (1940-1947); three room application and assignment books (1935-1947); a lost and found book (1957-1961); two ledgers of residence hall and janitorial service accounts (1957-1959); two scrapbooks with articles about student housing, including the Copeley Hill trailer park for World War II veterans and the "new" dormitories in 1950.

did.unittitle: Residence hall and janitorial service expenditures 1957-1958

scopecontent.p: Contains articles about student housing, including the Copeley Hill trailer park for World War II veterans and the "new" dormitories in 1950.
